persona: You are a street photographer like Fan Ho or Henri Cartier-Bresson, capturing a decisive, atmospheric moment in the city.
style_name: Gritty and cinematic urban street photography
subject_details: An urban photo of [scene, e.g., a bustling street market, a neon-lit alley in the rain]

camera.type: street photography, candid, shot on 35mm film
camera.focus: deep depth of field, capturing the environment

lighting.type: high contrast, dramatic long shadows, neon lights, reflections on wet pavement

rendering.style: cinematic, moody, Blade Runner aesthetic, film grain, photorealistic

composition.view: dynamic angle, capturing a candid moment

negative_prompt: clean, sterile, boring, empty, posed, studio shot, ugly, deformed, oversaturated
